description: Details required by condition 3 (Samples of Materials) of planning permission 19/00734/FUL (Proposed conversion of the existing three flats into a multi-generational house (Use Class C3))
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition 3 (Samples of Materials) of planning permission 19/00734/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this condition is hereby fully discharged.

Proposal - The proposed changes as set out in the submitted Covering Letter dated 09/06/2020 are as follows: Management Suite:o	South Elevation - flush wall letterbox units and cork cladding removed and replaced with a rendered wall; minimal design changes to the glazed entrance, fascia panel is wider to the sides of the building; steps improve to bolt-on stairs and the side panel will be perforated metal plate;o	North Elevation - the green roof will be set back; the skylight will be reduced in size; the green wall reduced in width on each side to show the anodized aluminium fascia panels;o	West Elevation - minor changes to the roof design including the green roof being set back and the fascia panel design is angled at the edge, inclusion of openable windows; timber clad has been removed; and,o	East Elevation - skylight has reduced in size; height from ground to fascia panel near the fire escape has reduced in height from 3340mm to 3320mm; inclusion of openable windows; slight changes to the width of the curtain wall panels.In addition to the above changes, the proposal seeks to replace the cladding of the Chancellor's Hall (Blocks A, B, C, D and E) with like-for-like cladding (exact colour of existing cladding unknown) as well as a redistribution of existing and proposed cycle parking across the site.
Please be advised that a fee of Â£206 is required for this application. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002
